title: Krauthamer on NA and image of Gopher John-evidence

content.question: The treatment of African Americans by Indigenous communities, as shown in Source 2, most directly led to which of the following developments?

choices.label: Indigenous people became more welcome in southern society after their embrace of slavery.
African Americans began to create their own maroon societies separate from Indigenous communities.
Indigenous societies made it difficult for mixed-race people to be fully accepted.
Indigenous communities refused to allow African Americans to fight alongside them in resisting American expansion.

content.answer: Indigenous societies made it difficult for mixed-race people to be fully accepted.
